page.title: 13Farming-Crop Survey.
page.content: We did a brief survey of the crops grown in our area.We had noticed that there has been quite a change in the crops grown in the fields near our school,particularly the change from cabbages to corn and wheat.many of the fields in this area have been used for growing potatoes,we counted at least six large fields of potatoes,which were being picked at the time.We counted two e fields of onions and four of cabbages.Most of the others that we were able to survey were being used for cereal growing, mainly wheat andd corn. Some of the farmers have changed their crops because they will make more money from growing cereal crops rather than cabbbages and onions.about a quarter of the area or less has grass for grazing or for making hay.There are very few fields actually used for animals.
